title: Greengage, nectarine and gooseberry fool
description: Late summer flavours abound in this beautiful layered dessert with crisp crumble and soft poached fruit.
ingredients: 2 gelatine leaves, soaked in cold water for five minutes
4 large, ripe nectarines, halved, stones removed
2 vanilla pods, split lengthways, seeds scraped out
8 ripe, firm greengages, halved, stones removed
